__comment: The current image metadata schema is as follows:
perma:     art url (optional string, user views art at /peruse/[perma]
(if not given, will use modified filename by default)
desc:      brief description of art (string, no restrictions)
long_desc: longer descriptio of art (optional string)
timestamp: datetime (string, some standard format (e.g., ISO8601))
For more advanced stuff (e.g., user interaction with votes/comments)
will need database support. Not hard to implement, just different.
Re-run server.js every time this file is updated.
- permalink convention: separated-by-dashes (created by default from fn)
